title: Manage Autogenous (AG) Grinding Mill
description: An operator manages an AG mill, which uses large rocks from the mine as the grinding media instead of steel balls.

tasks.description: Monitor the mill's performance, paying close attention to the rock charge level inside the mill.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator has a clear view of the mill's key parameters.

tasks.description: Notice that the charge level is too low, which will reduce grinding efficiency.
tasks.expected_outcome: The operator identifies the need to add more large rocks to the feed.

tasks.description: Instruct the mine to prioritize sending a load of coarse, hard ore to the crusher to generate more large rocks for the AG mill feed.
tasks.expected_outcome: A request is sent to the mine, and the AG mill feed is adjusted to restore the optimal charge level.
